etymology.description: semantic 辶 ‘walk, movement’ + phonetic 肴 (yáo).
etymology.interpretation: The movement radical hints at travel or paths, suggesting distance or going afar. 肴 supplies the sound yáo; together they convey the idea of going a long way, hence “distant/remote.”
etymology.simplification: Traditional 遙’s complex right-side component was replaced with the simpler, clearly phonetic 肴 to reduce strokes and better reflect the pronunciation; the 辶 component was retained.

examples.chinese: 我们进行一次遥控测试(我們進行一次遙控測試)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen jìnxíng yī cì yáokòng cèshì.

examples.chinese: 他住在遥远的山村(他住在遙遠的山村)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zhù zài yáoyuǎn de shāncūn.
examples.english: He lives in a remote mountain village.

examples.chinese: 遥感技术让我们观察地球(遙感技術讓我們觀察地球)。
examples.pinyin: Yáogǎn jìshù ràng wǒmen guānchá dìqiú.
examples.english: Remote sensing technology lets us observe the Earth.
